description: CommonBeamforming: This table stores common beamforming configuration parameters for cells in a radio access network.  `dateTime`: Timestamp of the configuration; `Area_Name`: Geographic area of the cell; `CellId`, `Id2`, `Id3`, `Id4`: Cell identifiers; `vsDataType`, `vsDataFormatVersion`: Metadata describing the data type and format; `CommonBeamforming.*`: Parameters related to digital pan, SSB beams, coverage shape, and other beamforming attributes (e.g., `digitalPan`, `ssbBeams`, `coverageShape`, `digitalTilt`, `cbfMacroTaperType`);  `CommonBeamforming.used*`: Indicate whether a parameter is actually used.
queries: Show me all CommonBeamforming configurations for Area_Name 'Downtown' where `CommonBeamforming.usedDigitalPan` is true.
What are the `CommonBeamforming.ssbBeams` values for CellId 1234 between 2023-10-26 10:00:00 and 2023-10-26 11:00:00?
Which cells (CellId) in Area_Name 'SuburbA' have `CommonBeamforming.cbfMacroTaperType` set to 'linear' and `CommonBeamforming.usedDigitalTilt` is false?
Find the latest `dateTime` for each `CellId` where `CommonBeamforming.coverageShape` is 'circular'.
